```{r}
library(tidyverse)
n <- 200 # antal punkter
theta <- seq(0, pi, length.out = n)
cx <- 0 #x-koordinat for origo
cy <- 0 # y-koordinat for origo
r <- 1 # radius

x <- cx + r*cos(theta)
y <- cy + r*sin(theta)
df <- data.frame(x = x, y = y, group  ="low")

cx <- 0 #x-koordinat for origo
cy <- 2 # y-koordinat for origo
r <- -1 # radius

x <- cx + r*cos(theta)
y <- cy + r*sin(theta)
df2 <- data.frame(x = x, y = y, group  ="upp")

df <- bind_rows(df, df2)
ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_polygon(fill = "skyblue", color = "black")
  geom_path(size = 1.2, colour = "blue") +   # kun buen
  coord_equal() +
  theme_minimal()
```
